amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 117-381 to clarify organizational structure of offices within ARPA-H, limit the amount of administrative funding that may be used to operate ARPA-H to 15%, remove the requirement of Senate confirmation of Director, and clarify ARPA-H's leasing authority.
amendment.purpose: Amendment clarifies organizational structure of offices within ARPA-H, limit the amount of administrative funding that may be used to operate ARPA-H to 15%, remove the requirement of Senate confirmation of Director, and clarify ARPA-H's leasing authority.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Eshoo amendment (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 381 - 40 (Roll no. 287).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Eshoo.
Roll call votes on amendments in House

Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Eshoo amendment (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 381 - 40 (Roll no. 287).
